featured.text: This centuries-old Chinese mind-body exercise is now gaining popularity in the United States.

After the 1960s, and especially since the 1980s, the high school prom in many areas has become a serious exercise in excessive consumption, with boys renting expensive tuxedos and girls wearing designer gowns.
Research shows that 31 amounts of exercise—even just 15 minutes a day—helps ease depression, enhance self-image, relieve stress, and much more.
These warm-up exercises are designed to help people _____ their muscles and prevent injuries.
In the five years since his heart transplant, he had been on an exercise program where he regularly rode a bicycle for five miles, swam each day, and walked a couple of miles.

other.text: In fact, 34 health studies prove that exercise doesn’t have to hurt to be effective.
They often live longer than those who don’t exercise.
Some people might prefer a lot of 36 exercise to more challenging exercise.
Over time, researchers have come to realize the importance of exercising when injured.
What did Alfred and Anthony think caused their heart problems? (A) Exercise.
And those small amounts of activity add up—30 minutes of light activity in two or three-minute bursts can be just as effective as a half-hour block of exercise.
According to fitness trainers, physically 36 exercises may make you breathe heavily and your muscles may ache temporarily, but exercise should not be painful.
So, no matter how busy you are, try to 40 for exercise every day, like a 15-minute walk with your dog.
When he returned, he felt “pretty good.” 31 When people have sprained a muscle or tendon, they are usually advised not to go right back to exercising until the pain goes away.
Many great forms of exercise—like walking, swimming, or gentle stretching—get results without the 38 or discomfort some people associate with exercise.
If a serious injury is ruled out and the pain is not getting worse after exercising, then the exercise “makes a lot of sense.” (A)
The “no pain, no gain” view of exercise is now considered old-fashioned.
In these places people rest, get plenty of sleep, eat healthy food, drink water instead of wine, and exercise in various ways.
Their consensus, however, is that unless the injury involves something as serious as a broken bone or a ripped muscle, moderate exercise can actually speed healing.
When you arrive for pick-up, your dog will be well-exercised and beautiful.
For the sake of your health, it is time to make regular exercise a part of your life.
Besides working, regular exercise is essential to keep the astronauts healthy in microgravity.
You needn’t worry about the harm of a sedentary lifestyle because you exercise regularly, right?
His exercise program was better than Anthony’s.
In fact, when active people consult him, he usually tells them to just keep exercising.
A person who exercises regularly (E) … who changed him into a gentleman.
Psychologically, this exercise may increase communication between the body and the mind and enable one to deal with other people more effectively.
They usually do not meet the standard of exercise recommended by WHO.
Which of the following may be inferred about those who do serious exercise?
In order to stay healthy and fit, John exercises _____.
Overall, most people simply aren’t exercising or moving around enough to counteract all the harm that can result from sitting nine hours or more a day.
Doing exercise makes you happy, and you don’t have to be a fitness 32 to do it.
Their hoops, often made of metal, were not merely toys for Greek children but served as exercise devices as well.
What is the best way to bring down high blood sugar level and blood pressure? (A) Exercising for 150 minutes or more every week.
Tai Chi Chuan is not only a physical but also a 19 exercise.
By exhaling air from the lungs in short (36) of laughter, breathing is quickened and heartbeats increased, which achieves (37) good as ten minutes on an exercise bike.
Exercise doesn’t always have to be laborious.
Keep in mind that even short periods of low-impact exercise serve as a powerful 39 to improve your health.
Coconut water, which contains salt and carbohydrates, is also more functional than water at restoring and maintaining a normal fluid 26 after exercise.
Regular exercisers, furthermore, are found to be about 30 percent less active on days when they exercise.
Recent studies show that people spend an average of 64 hours a week sitting, whether or not they exercise 150 minutes a week as recommended by World Health Organization (WHO).
People who desire a ______ figure should exercise regularly and maintain healthy eating habits.
These movements, forming an exercise system, 18 one to effortlessly experience the vital life force, or the Qi energy, in one’s body.

definition.zh_def: 運動；鍛煉，指為了增強身體健康而進行的體力活動。
definition.en_def: Physical activity that is done to improve health and fitness.
definition.example: I try to exercise for at least thirty minutes every day.
